INIT().details: This function is called when the module is installed or upgraded by the kernel.MUST BE GATED BY onlyKernel. Used to encompass any initialization or upgrade logic.

returns.major: - Major version upgrade indicates breaking change to the interface.
returns.minor: - Minor version change retains backward-compatible interface.

increaseMintApproval(address,uint256).details: Policies must explicity request how much they want approved before withdrawing.

VERSION().notice: Returns which semantic version of a module is being implemented.

activate().notice: Re-activate minting and burning after shutdown.

active().notice: Status of the minter. If false, minting and burning GDAO is disabled.

burnGdao(address,uint256).notice: Burn GDAO from an address. Must have approval.

changeKernel(address).notice: Function used by kernel when migrating to a new kernel.

deactivate().notice: Emergency shutdown of minting and burning.

decreaseMintApproval(address,uint256).notice: Decrease approval for specific withdrawer addresses

increaseMintApproval(address,uint256).notice: Increase approval for specific withdrawer addresses

mintApproval(address).notice: Mapping of who is approved for minting.

documentation.text: @notice Status of the minter. If false, minting and burning GDAO is disabled.

@notice Mapping of who is approved for minting.
 @dev    minter -> amount. Infinite approval is max(uint256).
@notice Burn GDAO from an address. Must have approval.

@notice Increase approval for specific withdrawer addresses
 @dev    Policies must explicity request how much they want approved before withdrawing.
@notice Decrease approval for specific withdrawer addresses
@notice Emergency shutdown of minting and burning.
@notice Re-activate minting and burning after shutdown.
@notice Wrapper for minting and burning functions of GDAO token.
